dict.acceptation: 强调；着重；（轮廓、图形等的）鲜明；突出，重读；

sent.orig: Networks. Emphasis or de-emphasis of higher frequencies, compressor, or expander can be specified.
sent.trans: 网络。可指定对高次频率加重或去加重、压缩器或扩展器。

sent.orig: Platonism put an emphasis on spirit and valued truth、kindness andbeauty and reached the ideal spiritual state.
sent.trans: 新柏拉图主义哲学思想强调精神至高无上，提倡追求以真、善、美为绝对顶点的精神价值。

sent.orig: Second, the emphasis on the value of human capital, increase staff training input.
sent.trans: 其次，重视人力资本的价值，加大职工培训投入力度。

sent.orig: Economic growth and environmental protection should be given equal emphasis.
sent.trans: 经济增长与环境保护，二者不可偏废。

sent.orig: Emphasis on teamwork, good communication and coordination ability and organizational capacity.
sent.trans: 注重团队精神，有良好的沟通协调能力与组织能力。
